item.title: Billing system and Teamspeak Host malfunction
item.description: Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.
item.content:encoded:
Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.

2021-06-10T10:39:23.000Z
Resolved

Due to a software error on a node, the billing system, web01 and the Teamspeak host were not accessible. The problem has been fixed since 10:40 UTC. We apologize for the inconvenience.

item.title: Some VPS offline
item.description: We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.
item.content:encoded:
We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.

2021-05-24T17:50:02.000Z
Resolved

Due to a distributed attack some VPS experienced degraded network stability. The network is stable again since 17:10 UTC. We apologise for the inconvenience.

item.title: Upgrade of core router equipment
item.description: Core Switches and Router are replaced with better hardware to increase throughput.
item.content:encoded:
We are replacing core switches and router hardware to increase throughput and scale the network.

Expect short network outages or degraded stability of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T07:33:30.119Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance shortly. Expect interruptions of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T08:50:48.568Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete. There was a single interruption of 30 seconds for IPv4 traffic and 5 minutes for IPv6 traffic.

item.title: Dedicated Server Relocation
item.description: We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers
item.content:encoded:
We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers. Affected customers have been notified via email.

2021-03-29T17:14:14.215Z
Resolved

We have completed the maintenance. Affected customers were offline for less than 5 minutes.
